summary: Implemented an admin “Rooms” landing page at /admin/rooms guarded by AdminRouteGuard, added it to the Admin menu, and added an in-code mapping of requested admin rooms to routes. Diff evidence also suggests multiple additional unrelated UI and feature changes beyond the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes to React Query hooks (principal-aware query keys, new/aliased hooks, placeholder hook).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1 or REQ-2, which are limited to admin rooms routes/nav and an /admin/rooms landing page.

hallucinated_features.description: Header navigation revamp (admin dropdown fully driven by constants, section ordering, mobile scrolling changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; requirements focus on routes/nav items existence and /admin/rooms landing page, not a header redesign.

hallucinated_features.description: Homepage/Hero content and imagery updates (badge text change, new background image).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; unrelated to admin rooms routing and landing page.

hallucinated_features.description: Content library/player component changes (ContentGrid, ContentCard, ContentPlayer enhancements).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; unrelated to admin rooms routing and landing page.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer updates (logo, admin login button, responsive scaling).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; unrelated to admin rooms routing and landing page.

hallucinated_features.description: Global styling and Tailwind configuration changes (backgrounds, animations, typography, overflow prevention).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; requirements did not call for broad styling/theme changes beyond making the /admin/rooms page responsive.

hallucinated_features.description: Layout changes (disabling HeroHelper on admin routes, route-aware background classes).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; requirements did not include layout/background changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Profile setup modal changes (simplification, backend method dependency removal).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; unrelated to admin rooms routing and landing page.

hallucinated_features.description: Major HeroHelper feature expansion (voice, memory, monitoring mode, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; unrelated to admin rooms routing and landing page.

hallucinated_features.description: Wallet page changes (mainnet node hosting integration, real-time transaction history per summary).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; unrelated to admin rooms routing and landing page.
Not requested; unrelated to admin rooms routing and landing page.
